articles.description: He will begin his mandatory five-week training in South Korea's Gyeonggi province before being deployed to a 'frontline' unit. All BTS members will eventually enlist too.
articles.content:
The oldest member of K-pop phenomenon BTS will begin his military service on December 13, becoming the first in the band to enlist, local media reported Thursday.

articles.content:
